name: Block Puzzle - Wood Games
description:
This is a 10×10 puzzle game. The rule is very simple. Put the three wooden blocks below into the chessboard. When the horizontal and vertical directions of the chessboard are filled, the wooden blocks will be eliminated. The more rows and columns eliminated, the higher the score obtained. Once there is no place to place a block on the chessboard, the game ends. In the game, you can use rotating props to help you change the direction of the wooden block. You can also use bomb props to blow up blocks you don't want or cannot place. Use props and place blocks cleverly, and you will become a master of wooden puzzles!

Game Highlights
- Completely free block puzzle game
- A wooden block puzzle game with unique design
- A wood cube puzzle with spin props and bomb props
- Simple yet challenging
- Suitable for players of all ages and skill levels
- No restrictions , anytime, anywhere, online and offline

What are you waiting for? Come and play this most attractive relax wood puzzle game with your friends and family now!
